name: Perfect Instrumentation
overview:
Since our incorporation is in year 1988, we, “Perfect Instrumentation Control Pvt Ltd” are an ISO 9001:2009 organization engaged in manufacturing and supplying a comprehensive range of Pipes & Tubes, Fittings and Valves. Under this affordable range, we offer Pipe & Tube Fittings, Nuts And Ferrule Fittings, Ball Valves Manual, Forged Stainless Valves and Needle Valves Integral Bonnet Double Ferrule Ends.

Industrial Segments: Oil & Gas
Trading Organization
Ports
Power Plant
Petrochemical
Refiner
Ship Building
Offshore
Sugar
Steel Plant
Chemical

Our Team: Production managers Quality analyzers Skilled & semi-skilled laborers Warehousing & packaging experts Sales & marketing professionals

Quality Assurance: Being an ISO 9001:2009 organization, we pay immense attention on the quality of our offered range of Pipes & Tubes, Fittings and Valves. These pipes and fittings offered by us are manufactured utilizing superior-grade components and basic raw material that is obtained from accredited vendors of the industry.

Warehousing & Packaging: We have a warehouse to store the raw materials and finish products. We also have a packaging unit for the final products. Furthermore, we use materials such as boxes, shrink wraps etc to pack our range. Our products are very carefully packed so that it can be delivered to far off places without any damage.

Our Products: Pipes & Tubes Industrial Fittings Industrial Valves Needle valves Industrial Manifolds Industrial Headers Spacer Rings & Flushing Rings
